text: Vy, o iudei, ne uverovali v Pisaniya i vernulis' k mnogobozhiyu yeshcho pri Muse. Ved' k vam prishol Musa s yasnymi znameniyami i chudom, dokazyvayushchimi istinnost' yego prorocheskoy missii. No kogda on ushol, chtoby molit'sya i obrashchat'sya k Bogu, vy sdelali sebe tel'tsa dlya pochitaniya. Vy vernulis' k yazychestvu i sovershili grekh, buduchi nepravednymi
